reviews.review:
If you name is geralt, you probably won't like this game XD
 
This is amazing sequel, i was pleased at the number of new gameplay elements involved, the addition of a well implemented challenging co-op mode, and the humor? excellent, i have nothing more to say.
I believe in GLaDOS and Cave Johnson supremacy
Still great, and always will be

Olumlu Yönleri
*Çıkış tarihine göre güzel grafikleri. 
*puzzle çözerkenki hikaya anlatımı
*Bir Valve klasiği olan easter eggleri
*Eşli kısmında da bir dostunuzla güzel ve eğlenceli vakit geçirme imkanı sunuyor. 
Olumsuz yönleri
*Bazı Bölümler sıkabiliyor.
*Co-op ı bitirdiniz zaman sadece sv kuran arkadaşın başarı alması
Sonuç
*Herkesin bir kerede olsa oynaması gereken bir oyun.

Tek kelimeyle harika. Sadece 3 akılda kalıcı karakterle size doyurucu bir hikaye sunuyor.Portal silahımızla bulmacaları çözüp ilerlerken GLaDOSun bize devamlı laf sokması oldukça eğlenceli.Bazı yerlerde bulmacalar beyin yakıyor.Coop modu da var o da oldukça eğlenceli. Herkesin deneyimlemesi gereken bir oyun.
If you have a DumbAss brother/freind dont BOTER
Fajna Gra Polecam Kupic Krutka, Ale Jest jescze MultiPlayer, i Jeszcze sa do tej gry Bardzo fajne mody za darmo!, Polecam
Good story, funny lines, good game-play, variety of achievements to complete once you finish the game, no cake to be lied to about, over all just buy it, would recommend.
Quite likely the coolest game I've played. Many hour spent on community developed levels.

This is probably the best storied game I have ever played. i won't spoil anything in this review, but the world building, character development and story progression is expertly crafted and even though the game has only one certain path, it feels like you are totally in control. 11/10 definitely would recommend. It doesn't even end with the end of the single-player game, there are extra mods and additions and even a full co-op campaign with the personable robots Atlas and P-body. And if even that isn't enough, there is a huge amount of user-created levels available to play

10년전 게임이라는 게 믿기지가 않습니다 역대급 명작이며 과학적인 물리 법칙까지 고려한 게임이고 친구랑 하면 극도의 즐거움을 맛볼수 있을 것입니다 아스트로니어 이후로 처음으로 큰 임팩트를 준 게임이며 신비로운것을 좋아하는 사람은 절대 고민하지 마시고 그냥 이게임을 하세요 스토리 모드까지는 쉽게 푸실 수 있습니다 하지만 커스텀 맵을 가시면 어려운 것을 좋아하는 사람들을 위한 임파서블에 가까운 난이도를 보여주는 맵도 있으며 현실세계 운동장도 부럽지 않을 만큼 광활하고 큰 맵을 보고 오줌을 지리실수 있습니다 자신의 지능과 사고력,공간 지각력을 테스트 해보고 싶으신 분들도 해볼만 한 게임입니다 진짜 미X 게임이다 이건 ㅇㅇ;;

One of the greatest games out there, period. The story flows perfectly while you solve clever puzzles and interesting new mechanics are introduced. The soundtrack is fantastic and evokes many different emotions. The writing and voice acting are top-notch. Once you've completed the campaign, you can still continue playing for many hours in the community test chambers. You'll find some absolutely amazing community-created maps that are super challenging and rewarding to solve. A lot of these community maps push the game to its limits and even introduce their own puzzle mechanics that aren't present in the campaign. Again, one of the best games ever.

OH MAN THIS GAME IS LOVE, Playing it in 2021 and it still worth playing something like this atleast once in your life. But yeah it's sometimes too difficult mentally, but don't worry you will do it if you have brain or you wanna train your Brain.
Dammn it has a multiplayer mode, just try it guys please so maybe we can re-establish the online community of this game again and that would be damnn cool to play it with you and other people.
All though you can also try local multiplayer.;

One Last fact, this game has unlimited levels as the community, valve itself & mods has made them thought the past 14 years so keep playing! Enjoy and FRuk your brain's all power & potential.
This game was an amazing experiance

G胖不会数3的出处之一。第一人称射击(不
是枪战)+解密。剧情、配乐、画面均是顶尖
其中剧情涉及人工智能浪漫主义。很难想象
这是一款2007年也即14年前的游戏!用现在的眼光来看《传送门》系列依然是一部神作。3D眩晕者慎买。《传送门2》需要的配
置要比1稍高些,除这一问题外,《传送门2》
没理由不玩。两作流程加起来约18小时。
Not as good as the first Portal, but that's still really amazing thanks to great humour, graphics and gameplay

[h1]A game everyone [u]must[/u] play[/h1]
I used to play both Portal and its sequel when they only came out with my elder siblings, and recently I've decided to finally complete them, and I can definetely say that this is a masterpiece. It draws your attention mostly not with adorable graphics(although I really appreciate the post-apo level design), but with puzzles, that require analyzing the situation and sometimes thinking immediately, which adds even more fun. The main mechanics is pretty simple, but it never gets boring as they add different features and complications during the game. And, of course, the charisma of the main characters(especially GLADOS jokes, I love them so much xd) is great and well-writen.
So, highly recommend!
Highly recommend, especially for those who like puzzle games. Great story that keeps you engaged and amazing gameplay that has kept well over the years.

Use your brain to it's full power
brrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr
Portal 2 is a good game, but bad speed-game. The game is worth the money, especially since it's probably $5. 102/10 would recommend.
月球和地球链接也太酷了，最后想要道歉的惠特利莫名有点可爱！
延续一代的特色,剧情上也接着一代的剧情,补完了一代的世界观, 看来从一代开始玩是对的. 课千万别以为只是一款解密啊哈哈哈 吸引我的真是剧情.

An amazing masterpiece! Ever since I've bought this game since 2014 for my PS3, it's been truly a mind-boggling puzzle with the variety of objects, such as portals, cubes, lasers, turrets, buttons, plasma orbs, launch plates, gels, etc! The test chambers come in many shapes and sizes that you would want to test with them over and over again until you've actually made GLaDOS exhausted from watching you test. Amazing story as well and really funny voice actor for Wheatley with a YouTube channel that still makes content! It's been many years since I've completed this as well and coming back a week ago in 2021, I did it again and still as fun and confusing as ever! It really puts my brain to the test.
take the tall orange man head and make fun of him 11/10

I'd recommend playing the first Portal before this one, and after doing that there should be no question about whether you'll enjoy Portal 2. Haven't gotten to co-op yet but the main story is very fun.
Go play, worth your moneez! Epic game! POGGERS! Pög. LOLL LAMAO

Przepis na sernik
składniki:
Masa serowa:

1 kg twarogu półtłustego dwukrotnie zmielonego, twarogu z wiaderka lub quarku 20%
250 g cukru (= 1,25 szklanki)
3 łyżeczki cukru waniliowego
100 g masła (lub margaryny)
7 jajek (rozmiar M)
2 łyżki skrobi ziemniaczanej (= 30 g)
2 łyżki mąki pszennej (= 30 g)
Opcjonalnie:

skórka starta z pomarańczy
ok. 2 garści rodzynek
parę kropli aromatu
Dodatkowo:

cukier puder do posypania

Sposób przygotowania:
Dno tortownicy o średnicy 26 cm wyłożyć papierem do pieczenia, a następnie zacisnąć obręcz.
Oddzielić żółtka od białek.
W miseczce wymieszać skrobię z mąką pszenną.
W misie miksera utrzeć miękkie masło z cukrem i cukrem waniliowym na jasną masę. (Cukier się nie rozpuści, masa stanie się kremowa dopiero po dodaniu żół-tek). Dalej miksując na najwyższych obrotach, dodawać stopniowo po jednym żół-tku.
Zmniejszyć obroty miksera na średnie i dodawać stopniowo ser, a następnie wymieszaną mąkę. (Teraz można dodać startą skórkę z pomarańczy, aromat lub rodzynki i wymieszać do połączenia).
Osobno ubić białka na sztywno i wmieszać delikatnie szpatułką do masy serowej.
Masę serową wyłożyć do tortownicy i wyrównać. Piec w nagrzanym piekarniku ok. 60 minut w temperaturze 170°C (grzałka góra- dół). Wyłączyć piekarnik i studzić sernik przy lekko uchylonych drzwiczkach piekarnika. Pozostawić do całkowitego ostygnięcia. Zimny sernik wstawić na parę godzin do lodówki.
Sernik oprószyć cukrem pudrem lub polać polewą czekoladową.

Smacznego!
One of the best games ever made, from the physics to the store to the voice acting!

i dont like puzzle games a lot but this one is special its pretty good idk if i would play solo though also the in game chat thing is so shit remove it im tryna talk to my friend on discord and all i can hear is his in game mic destorying my ears

I didn't play Single Player for long, but Co-op is amazing with a family member or friend. You can just mess around and use the laugh gesture at your friend the whole way, while being a great partner and teach your friend that you are better, when GLADoS says who is the better robot.
